summary: The story behind literary persona JT LeRoy, the fictional writer created by American author Laura Albert.
cast: Laura Albert|Bruce Benderson|Terrence Owens|Ira Silverberg|Dennis Cooper|Panio Gianopoulos|Savannah Knoop|Asia Argento|Stephen Beachy|Bono|Arthur Bradford|Billy Corgan|Debbie Harry|Mary Karr|Geoffrey Knoop|Courtney Love|David Milch|Matthew Modine|Tatum O'Neal|Michael Pitt|Lou Reed|Winona Ryder|Gus Van Sant|Tom Waits|Harvey Weinstein|Vanessa Carlton|Rosario Dawson|Julie Delpy|Eric Harris|Gaby Hoffmann|Isabelle Huppert|Shirley Manson|Michael Moore
title: Author: La mentira de JT LeRoy
